title: Debugging is bad for you
brief: Using the debugger is no better than manually checking your printed out source code. There is a better way.

title: Four ways to split a story
brief: Approaches to reducing story complexity for iterative development.

title: BDD and Legacy Systems
brief: Behaviour driven development, by itself, doesn’t work on legacy systems. A key ingredient is still missing and I’m going to talk about what that is.

title: Pattern Fun Facts: Decorator
brief: In pattern fun facts we take a look a pattern and tell you something you didn’t know. This month: The decorator pattern can help you do incremental delivery.

title: I can tell you, but then you'd understand
brief: On anonymous functions, code readability and design erosion.

title: A well rounded bias
brief: Assumptions making an arse out of me and umption.

title: Testing makes it hard to test
brief: Only testing at one level makes your code harder, not easier to test.

title: Test Augmentation
brief: Supercharged manual testing as an alternative to challenging test automation projects.

title: On Velocityraptors
brief: How to outwit and out-wile the most agile of predators.

title: Honey, I think I Just Made a Factory in JS
The King is Dead, Long Live the King
brief: An apocryphal story about test automation.
